channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Percy and Reed Haircare
channel.desc: Percy and Reed brings you new haircare products you always needed but could never find and they only create products which work - bringing British individuality and their own style to your hair.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: M. Asam Beauty Is Our Tradition
channel.desc: Enjoy younger looking skin with M.Asam, an effective skincare range that blends innovative technique and ingredients including grape oil, to target fine lines and wrinkles.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis The Gift Of Great Skin
channel.desc: We bring you the beauty of Elemis - famed for their premier spa and salon treatments. Tune in and discover incredible value skincare, perfect for gifting or treating yourself to.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty's Best Finds
channel.desc: Up your beauty game with our best finds in the industry, from favourite formulas to the latest releases. Whether you want to shake up your make-up or step up your skincare, find it here.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: CIROA
channel.desc: Elevate your everyday self-care with wonderful beauty formulas from CIROA.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Algenist Biotechnological Skincare
channel.desc: Founded by a team of biotechnology scientists in San Francisco, Algenist focuses on the ability of effective, bioactive ingredients, including Alguronic Acid, to deliver visible anti-ageing results.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gift Guide
channel.desc: Our Beauty Gift Guide will help you find the perfect present for friends, family and colleagues with a wide range of luxurious, pampering products to make them smile this season.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gifting
channel.desc: Featuring a wide spectrum of beauty gifts, from skincare to cosmetics, this show aims to inspire you in your choice of festive gifts for the special people in your life.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis The Gift Of Great Skin
channel.desc: We bring you the beauty of Elemis - famed for their premier spa and salon treatments. Tune in and discover incredible value skincare, perfect for gifting or treating yourself to.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Alpha-H Skincare
channel.desc: Give your skin a boost with hi-tech skincare featuring a synergy of blended botanical ingredients coupled with glycolic acid - an alpha hydroxy acid which occurs naturally in sugar cane.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Gatineau Beauty Gifts
channel.desc: Gatineau fan? Us too! Join us as we talk all things beauty with this specialist brand, with a whole host of luxurious, must-have formulas any skincare sage would love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Feel Good Beauty with Alison Young
channel.desc: Discover beauty that lets you feel as good as you look with a little help from Alison Young, including marvellous make-up, special skincare and much more.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis The Gift Of Great Skin
channel.desc: We bring you the beauty of Elemis - famed for their premier spa and salon treatments. Tune in and discover incredible value skincare, perfect for gifting or treating yourself to.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Margaret Dabbs London
channel.desc: Pamper your hands and feet with innovative hand and footcare formulas from international podiatrist and foot expert Margaret Dabbs.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Molton Brown Indulgent Gifts
channel.desc: Treat friends and family to a little indulgent luxury with fragrance experts Molton Brown. Find the perfect gift sets from London's bath, body and beauty connoisseurs.
